review: Works well. I don't have access to most of the apps because I have Comcast and they block it. The fire stick works well with sling TV and it's the fastest Netflix app I've ever used.One complaint: the remote malfunctions and send to get stuck in one direction. Not sure if it's a hardware or software issue.One more: I thought it would incorporate titles from other apps like Netflix into its home screen.
author: Nick Brisson

review: After waiting 3 weeks, I received my Fire Stick.  I plugged it into my sound system and it immediately was recognized.  Using the supplied remote was simple.  It is somewhat limited on applications, but it has the ones I'm most interested in.  I am satisfied with my purchase and look forward to taking it with me when I travel on business.
